modName: Shadow of the Colossus - Forbidden Sword
summary: Sword from Shadow of the Colossus
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=110]SoTC - Forbidden Sword[/size][/u][/center]

Model and texture created by artist Nate Hallahan of Hammerwing Studios. Based on the sword from Shadow of the Colossus.

[b]#Thanks to SilentBob92PL we now have a stand alone version you can craft under Iron![/b]

The Forbidden Sword from popular game Shadow of the Colossus! 
This mod now has two files: one that replaces the iron sword in the game, and a standalone version that can be forged in the Iron menu.

Please feel free to use this sword in any mod you create as long as you let us know!

This model and texture set can be used to create other mods as long as original credit is given and our Studio is notified at hammerwingstudios@gmail.com
author: Nate Hallahan of HammerWing Studios
